doc:
Sam Kinison https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sam_Kinison 0 Samuel Burl Kinison (; December 8, 1953 – April 10, 1992) was an American stand-up comedian and actor. A former Pentecostal preacher, he performed stand-up routines that were most often characterized by an intense style, similar to charismatic preachers, and punctuated by his distinct scream. Samuel_Burl_Kinison ( ; December_8_,_1953 – April_10_,_1992 ) was an_American_stand-up_comedian_and_actor . A_former_Pentecostal_preacher , he performed stand-up_routines that were_most_often_characterized by an_intense_style , similar to charismatic_preachers , and punctuated by his_distinct_scream .
